article_metadata.news_keywords: karl rove, GOP, candidates, cant, win, negativity

og.description:
Doom and gloom won't win elections, Republican operative Karl Rove says, so he'll be surprised to see Donald Trump take the GOP nomination.
In an appearance Tuesday on Fox News Channel's  The O'Reilly Factor,   Rove was asked by host Bill O'Reilly whether he saw things like...
